channel.title: NPR Topics: National
channel.description: NPR coverage of national news, U.S. politics, elections, business, arts, culture, health and science, and technology. Subscribe to the NPR Nation RSS feed.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: U.S. to exit 66 international organizations in further retreat from global cooperation
item.description: Most of the targets are U.N.-related agencies, commissions and advisory panels that focus on climate, labor and other issues that the Trump administration has categorized as catering to diversity and "woke" initiatives.
item.content:encoded:
Most of the targets are U.N.-related agencies, commissions and advisory panels that focus on climate, labor and other issues that the Trump administration has categorized as catering to diversity and "woke" initiatives.

(Image credit: John Minchillo)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Minneapolis' police chief gives his perspective of the deadly ICE shooting
item.description: NPR's Mary Louise Kelly talks with Brian O'Hara, the police chief in Minneapolis, about the shooting in which an ICE agent killed a 37-year-old woman.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Mary Louise Kelly talks with Brian O'Hara, the police chief in Minneapolis, about the shooting in which an ICE agent killed a 37-year-old woman.
item.dc:creator: Mary Louise Kelly

item.title: Minnesota Sen. Tina Smith weighs in on Minneapolis shooting death by ICE agent
item.description: NPR's Juana Summers talks with Minnesota Sen. Tina Smith about the Minneapolis shooting in which an ICE agent killed a 37-year-old woman.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Juana Summers talks with Minnesota Sen. Tina Smith about the Minneapolis shooting in which an ICE agent killed a 37-year-old woman.
item.dc:creator: Alejandra Marquez Janse

item.title: The role Secretary Marco Rubio is playing in Venezuela's future
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio is set to play a central role in Venezuela now that Nicolas Maduro has been ousted. John Hudson, national security reporter for The Washington Post, weighs in.
item.content:encoded: Secretary of State Marco Rubio is set to play a central role in Venezuela now that Nicolas Maduro has been ousted. John Hudson, national security reporter for The Washington Post, weighs in.
item.dc:creator: Mary Louise Kelly

item.title: An immigration and enforcement officer shoots and kills a woman in Minneapolis
item.description: An officer with Immigration and Customs Enforcement shot and killed a woman during the Trump administrations' latest immigration crackdown in Minneapolis.
item.content:encoded: An officer with Immigration and Customs Enforcement shot and killed a woman during the Trump administrations' latest immigration crackdown in Minneapolis.
item.dc:creator: Matt Sepic

item.title: What we know so far about the fatal ICE shooting of a Minneapolis woman
item.description: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem said she spoke with Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz and acknowledged that they hold "very different viewpoints" on the shooting that killed a 37-year-old woman.
item.content:encoded:
Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem said she spoke with Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz and acknowledged that they hold "very different viewpoints" on the shooting that killed a 37-year-old woman.

(Image credit: Ben Hovland/MPR)
item.dc:creator: Juliana Kim

item.title: Nick Reiner's attorney removes himself from case
item.description: Defense attorney Alan Jackson said that circumstances beyond his and Reiner's control made it "impossible" to continue representation.
item.content:encoded:
Defense attorney Alan Jackson said that circumstances beyond his and Reiner's control made it "impossible" to continue representation.

(Image credit: Richard Shotwell/Invision/AP)
item.dc:creator: Steve Futterman

item.title: One year into an uneven recovery, L.A.'s fire survivors mark a somber milestone
item.description: The recovery from last year's deadly wildfires in Los Angeles has been slow and uneven for a lot of reasons, with survivors struggling to navigate a complex patchwork of systems to rebuild.
item.content:encoded:
The recovery from last year's deadly wildfires in Los Angeles has been slow and uneven for a lot of reasons, with survivors struggling to navigate a complex patchwork of systems to rebuild.

(Image credit: Kirk Siegler/NPR)
item.dc:creator: Kirk Siegler

item.title: 'American Reich' author details a national surge in bigotry and white supremacy
item.description: Journalist Eric Lichtblau says President Trump's incendiary rhetoric has stoked a "new age of hate." His book centers on a murder committed by a young neo-Nazi in Orange County, Calif.
item.content:encoded: Journalist Eric Lichtblau says President Trump's incendiary rhetoric has stoked a "new age of hate." His book centers on a murder committed by a young neo-Nazi in Orange County, Calif.
item.dc:creator: Dave Davies

item.title: U.S. seizes Russian-flagged oil tanker with ties to Venezuela
item.description: U.S. forces have seized a Russian-flagged oil tanker in the north Atlantic after a two week chase. This is part of the larger U.S. campaign aimed at tankers going to and from Venezuela.
item.content:encoded: U.S. forces have seized a Russian-flagged oil tanker in the north Atlantic after a two week chase. This is part of the larger U.S. campaign aimed at tankers going to and from Venezuela.
item.dc:creator: Bill Chappell
